i1.name: Break_the_Mold
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Rell's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|{{pp|8 to 16}}|magic damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and reduce the target's {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}} by 10% for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks against them. Basic attacks against enemy champions will refresh the duration for all nearby afflicted enemies.

'''Rell''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} equal to the sum of the resistances reduced from all afflicted enemies, respectively, and ''Break the Mold's'' '''bonus''' damage is increased equal to the sum of the resistances reduced from the target.
''Break the Mold'' will reduce the target's {{as|armor}} and {{as|magic resistance}} by a minimum of {{pp|5 to 12 for 8|1;3;5;8;10;12;15;17}}, or {{pp|0.5 to 2 for 3|1;2;13}} versus {{tip|minions}}.
'''Rell's''' {{tip|attack windup}} is reduced{{ft|by {{pp|100-(0.42 to 0.39)/0.42*100|key=%}}.|to {{pp|(0.42 to 0.39)/(0.55/{{ccd|Rell|as_base}})*100|round=3|key=%}}.}}
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Rell's basic attacks deal 8undefined − 16undefined (based on level) bonus magic damage and reduce the target's armor and magic resistance by 10% for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks against them. Basic attacks against enemy champions will refresh the duration for all nearby afflicted enemies.
Rell gains bonus armor and bonus magic resistance equal to the sum of the resistances reduced from all afflicted enemies, respectively, and Break the Mold's bonus damage is increased equal to the sum of the resistances reduced from the target.
Break the Mold will reduce the target's armor and magic resistance by a minimum of 1;3;5;8;10;12;15;17 ‒ undefined, or 1;2;13 ‒ undefined versus minions.
Rell's attack windup is reduced
i1.notes:
* The resistances are stolen after the damage from the triggering attack is calculated, meaning only subsequent attacks will benefit from the reduction.
* '''Rell's''' [[buff]] accumulates enemies with ''Break the Mold's'' [[debuff]] and she will consequently lose a portion of the bonus resistances gained as afflicted enemies die. This is contrary to other effects described as "thefts" (e.g. {{ai|Seismic Shard|Malphite}} and {{ai|Subjugate|Trundle}}) that are implemented by granting a buff to the caster that is proportionate, though independent, to the debuff applied to the target (i.e. in those instances, each persists for the full duration regardless).

q1.name: Shattering_Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rell''' thrusts her lance in the target direction, completely destroying damage-mitigating {{tip|shield|shields}} of enemies hit before dealing them {{as|magic damage}}, reduced to 50% against enemies beyond the first. The first enemy hit is also afflicted with {{ai|Break the Mold|Rell}}.
If '''Rell''' is tethered with {{ai|Attract and Repel|Rell}}, she and the bound ally {{tip|heal}} for each enemy champion hit.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rell thrusts her lance in the target direction, completely destroying damage-mitigating shields of enemies hit before dealing them magic damage, reduced to 50% against enemies beyond the first. The first enemy hit is also afflicted with Rell's Break the Mold.
If Rell is tethered with Rell's Attract and Repel, she and the bound ally heal for each enemy champion hit.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 210}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Secondary Damage|{{ap|70*0.5 to 210*0.5}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}}}
{{st|Heal Per Champion|{{ap|10 to 30}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% of '''missing''' health)}}}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Secondary Damage: (+ 25% AP)
• Heal Per Champion: (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% of missing health)

w1.name: Ferromancy:_Crash_Down
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While mounted, '''Rell''' gains {{as|{{pp|key=%|5 to 15 for 11|1;7 to 16}} {{sti|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, which is only {{pp|key=%|20 to 40|formula=20% + (40% - 20%) / 17 * (level - 1)}} as effective for 3 seconds when she takes damage from non-{{tip|minions}} and is removed for 4 seconds when she becomes {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or {{tip|polymorph|polymorphed}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Rell''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} to the target location over the cast time, transforming her mount into durable armor and upon landing dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies and {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for 1 second. '''Rell''' keeps {{tip|dash|sliding}} forward another {{tt|300 units|Estimated}} over {{tt|{{fd|0.5}} seconds|Estimated}}, though not through terrain, affecting further enemies along her path.

While dismounted, she gains the ability to cast {{ai|Ferromancy: Mount Up|Rell}}. '''Rell''' will automatically revert to being mounted without casting the ability and reset {{ais|Ferromancy: Mount Up|Rell}} cooldown upon completing a {{si|Recall}} channel or respawning.

''This ability can only be cast while mounted. '''Rell''' can cast {{ai|Attract and Repel|Rell}} and {{ai|Magnet Storm|Rell}} during the leap, and is not considered to be dismounted until after the leap ends.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: While mounted, Rell gains 1;7 to 16 ‒ undefined bonus movement speed, which is only 20% − 40% (based on level) as effective for 3 seconds when she takes damage from non-minions and is removed for 4 seconds when she becomes immobilized or polymorphed.
Active: Rell leaps to the target location over the cast time, transforming her mount into durable armor and upon landing dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and knocking them up for 1 second. Rell keeps sliding forward another 300 units over 0.5 seconds, though not through terrain, affecting further enemies along her path.
While dismounted, she gains the ability to cast Rell's Ferromancy: Mount Up. Rell will automatically revert to being mounted without casting the ability and reset Rell's Ferromancy: Mount Up cooldown upon completing a Recall channel or respawning.
This ability can only be cast while mounted. Rell can cast Rell's Attract and Repel and Rell's Magnet Storm during the leap, and is not considered to be dismounted until after the leap ends.
w1.notes:
* '''Rell''' {{tip|dash|slides}} between 250 and 350 units in testing, depending on how far the spell was targeted. It is not known where this is intended.
* If '''Rell''' dashes before a wall on the map, the slide will cover a shorter distance to the terrain over the same time, moving slower.
** {{pending for test}} Interaction with player-made walls.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Rell''' is dashing/in cast time:
{{ct|attack=false|move=false|cast={{ai|Q|Rell}} is disabled. {{ai|E|Rell}} and {{ai|R|Rell}} are usable.|items=true,,,false,false,,,false|spells=true,false,false,false,false|interrupts=death}}

w2.name: Ferromancy:_Mount_Up
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While dismounted, '''Rell''' gains {{sti|{{as|10% '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|{{as|10% '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} and a {{tip|shield}} that lasts until destroyed or casting {{ai|Ferromancy: Mount Up|Rell}}, but her {{as|'''base''' movement speed}} is modified to {{as|250|ms}}, and she has a movement speed cap of {{pp|key=|290 to 400|formula=290 + (110) / 17 * (level - 1)}}.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Rell''' transforms her armor into a mount, gaining {{as|15% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for {{fd|3.5}} seconds, increased to an amount when moving towards enemy champions.

'''Rell's''' next basic attack during this time gains {{sti|100 '''bonus''' attack range}} and consumes the {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} to have a {{fd|0.2}}-second cast time during which she {{tip|dash|charges}} at the target's location. At the end of the dash or upon premature collision, she deals them {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, {{tip|stun|stuns}} them for 1 second, and {{tip|airborne|flings}} them 150 units over herself.
''Ferromancy: Mount Up'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Rell's''' basic attack timer.
While mounted, she gains the ability to cast {{ai|Ferromancy: Crash Down|Rell}}.
w2.descriptionHtml:
Passive: While dismounted, Rell gains 10% bonus armor and 10% bonus magic resistance and a shield that lasts until destroyed or casting Rell's Ferromancy: Mount Up, but her base movement speed is modified to 250, and she has a movement speed cap of 290 − 400 (based on level).
Active: Rell transforms her armor into a mount, gaining 15% bonus movement speed for 3.5 seconds, increased to an amount when moving towards enemy champions.
Rell's next basic attack during this time gains 100 bonus attack range and consumes the bonus movement speed to have a 0.2-second cast time during which she charges at the target's location. At the end of the dash or upon premature collision, she deals them bonus magic damage, stuns them for 1 second, and flings them 150 units over herself.
Ferromancy: Mount Up resets Rell's basic attack timer.
While mounted, she gains the ability to cast Rell's Ferromancy: Crash Down.
w2.notes:
* '''Rell''' will always respawn and start the game as mounted.
* The basic attack reset is not considered one for {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.
* '''Rell''' can use the empowered attack even while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}.
* The {{tip|dash}} can be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} but the attack's effects will still be applied.
* {{tip|Displacement immunity}} will not resist the application of the {{tip|stun}}.
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, {{tip|death|dies}}, or is too far away or no longer in {{tip|sight}} during the empowered attack's cast time, it is cancelled but not consumed.
w2.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 40,40,40,40,40 as 40

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)

e1.name: Attract_and_Repel
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Rell''' forms a {{tip|tether}} between her and the ally bound by ''Attract and Repel'', granting the ally {{as|10% of her '''total''' armor}} and {{as|10% of her '''total''' magic resistance}} while they are nearby.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Rell''' magnetically binds herself and the allied champion nearest to the cursor with ''Attract and Repel''. '''Rell''' can then recast ''Attract and Repel'' while the tether persists.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Rell''' erupts the tether, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to and {{tip|stun|stunning}} all enemies between and around her and the bound ally for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.

'''Rell''' can [[Unit-targeted|self-target]] to dispel the current bind if she and her bound ally are not near enemy champions, and if she has not casted an [[champion ability|ability]] nor taken damage from or attacked enemy champions within the last 3 seconds. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
''Attract and Repel'' will incur a {{fd|2.75}}-second {{sti|cooldown}} with no cost if '''Rell''' binds to an ally and a 1-second cooldown with no cost if she self-targets.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Rell forms a tether between her and the ally bound by Attract and Repel, granting the ally 10% of her total armor and 10% of her total magic resistance while they are nearby.
Active: Rell magnetically binds herself and the allied champion nearest to the cursor with Attract and Repel. Rell can then recast Attract and Repel while the tether persists.
Recast: Rell erupts the tether, dealing magic damage to and stunning all enemies between and around her and the bound ally for 0.5 seconds.
Rell can Unit-targeted to dispel the current bind if she and her bound ally are not near enemy champions, and if she has not casted an champion ability nor taken damage from or attacked enemy champions within the last 3 seconds. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
Attract and Repel will incur a 2.75-second cooldown with no cost if Rell binds to an ally and a 1-second cooldown with no cost if she self-targets.
e1.notes: * The effects render before the cast time. * All units can see the effective area of the tether. Both conduits can see the tether range when within 600 units of it. * ''Attract and Repel'' can be cast on allies even if they are {{tip|untargetable}}. ** '''Rell''' has an arrow indicator that points to the other conduit. Depending on the distance it glows blue (0–900), yellow (900–2020), and red (2020+) * ''Attract and Repel'' will be placed on a very short cooldown (less than {{fd|0.1}} seconds) when the tether is reapplied to the bound ally after the two become in tether range again. * Rell immediately unbinds from tethered allies when they or she dies. * Rell cannot begin, end, or erupt a tether by using the Self-Cast hotkey.

r1.name: Magnet_Storm
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rell''' erupts with magnetic fury, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} all nearby enemies {{tt|towards her|to a ring 225 units around Rell, but minimum 100 pull distance}} and creating a field of gravitational force around her for the next 2 seconds that deals {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds to nearby enemies and continuously {{tip|kinematics|drags}} them towards her.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Rell erupts with magnetic fury, pulling all nearby enemies towards her and creating a field of gravitational force around her for the next 2 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies and continuously drags them towards her.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|15 to 35}} {{as|(+ {{fd|13.75}}% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage Per Target|{{ap|120 to 280}} {{as|(+ 110% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* Enemies that leave the field can still be dragged after entering the corresponding area again.
* ''Magnet Storm'' will '''not''' drag units that are:
** {{tip|Dash|Dashing}}.
** Being displaced (e.g. by {{tip|airborne}} effects or via abilities such as {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}).
** {{tip|Attach|Attached}}.
** {{tip|Displacement immune|Displacement immune}}.
** {{tip|cc-immune|Immune to crowd control}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the initial {{tip|airborne|pull}} but not the dragging effect.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 13.75% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage Per Target: (+ 110% AP)
